Class Assembler

java.lang.Object
Assembler
public class Assembler
extends java.lang.Object
class implementing CHIP-8 assembler

  • Method Details

    • assemble

      public java.util.ArrayList<Assembler.AssemblerResult> assemble​(java.lang.String assembly, int linen) throws Assembler.AssemblerException
      assembles one assembly line
      Parameters:
      assembly - one line of assembly code
      linen - number of that line
      Returns:
      list of assembly result
      Throws:
      Assembler.AssemblerException - is thrown on assembly error

    • generateByteCode

      public byte[] generateByteCode​(java.lang.String assembly, int linen) throws Assembler.AssemblerException
      generate bytecode of one assembly line
      Parameters:
      assembly - one assembly line
      linen - number of that line
      Returns:
      bytecode for the assembly
      Throws:
      Assembler.AssemblerException - thrown on assembly error

    • generateOutput

      public Assembler.Assembled generateOutput​(java.lang.String assembly, int linen) throws Assembler.AssemblerException
      get assembler output (bytecode with line numbers) in a placeholder
      Parameters:
      assembly - assembly line
      linen - line number
      Returns:
      bytecode and corresponding line numbers mapping array
      Throws:
      Assembler.AssemblerException

    • fixOffsets

      public java.lang.String fixOffsets​(java.lang.String assembly) throws Assembler.AssemblerException
      function used for fixing offsets when applying operation on assembly code
      Parameters:
      assembly - assembly code from view
      Returns:
      corrected assembly code
      Throws:
      Assembler.AssemblerException - thrown on assembly error
